name: Cook the Book: Bird to the Last Drop Soup
description: Thanksgiving is particularly hard on the fridge. Leading up to the big day, the fridge is filled to capacity. I know mine is stuffed so precariously right now, I have to think twice before opening the door. The fridge gets...
recipeIngredient: 2 cups turkey meat, cubed or torn into small pieces
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put the broth and carcass in an 8-quart pot over low heat and bring to a simmer. Cook and cover for 1 hour.
Add the vegetables, rice, turkey meat, Old Bay, and thyme to the pot and simmer for another 20 minutes
